{
  "topologyContent": "# topology documentation: http://containerlab.dev/lab-examples/single-srl/
name: srl01
topology:
  kinds:
    nokia_srlinux:
      type: ixrd3
      image: ghcr.io/nokia/srlinux

  nodes:
    srl1:
      kind: nokia_srlinux
    srl2:
      kind: nokia_srlinux

  links:
    - endpoints: ["srl1:e1-1","srl2:e1-1"]"
}
